abstracts.cdata!:
The Zhejiang Urban Environment for China
            will construct a ring road at the inner side of the moat,
            connecting the road net around the town and the internal
            road net; laying the sewer net in the central town area.
            This construction will have a profound meaning in terms of
            protecting old town's cultural feature, developing
            economic and tourist resources, decreasing environment
            pollution, improving living quality and promoting
            sustainable socioeconomic development. The resettlement
            policies will include cash compensation; offer or
            resettlement houses; offer of low rent houses for the poor.
            In cash compensation program, the compensation is calculated
            by the replacement price of the demolished house plus the
            land price. For each household, if the construction acreage
            of demolished old houses is within 250
